ash.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: the soft grey powder that remains after something has been burned
ash.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: a tree that is common in Britain and North America, or the wood from this tree
ash.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: a British organization that opposes smoking and the tobacco industry. It tries to influence the government to put high taxes on tobacco and to make laws that restrict smoking, cigarette advertising etc.
